name: Gruvbox For Youtube

usercssData.name: YouTube - Custom colors video progress bar
usercssData.description: Brighten up your YouTube experience with this custom video progress bar. The subtle yet vibrant glows will bring some life and color to the YouTube HTML5 video player. If you fancy something cute and animated, try this alternative style: YouTube - Nyan Cat progress bar video player theme.
usercssData.author: zoid

options.label: Solid*

options.label: Glow/gradient

sections.code:
#hot-network-questions, .module.community-bulletin, module.sidebar-related, #chat-feature, #footer-sites, #left-sidebar.left-sidebar.js-pinned-left-sidebar, #feed-link, #herobox, .s-hero, .ad, .ad-container { display: none; }
#content { border-left-width: 0 !important; }

usercssData.name: DuckDuckGo Nightly Blue - No Background Image
usercssData.description:
Same as https://userstyles.org/styles/171268/duckduckgo-nightly-blue but without the triangle background image.

A dark blue theme for DuckDuckGo. It is recommended you use start.duckduckgo.com instead of duckduckgo.com if you want to access the homepage.
usercssData.author: KingCommandoJimmoTheIII
